data.current_summary: API endpoint to search similarity using a song identifier
data.current_description:
Endpoint for an end-user client to search similarity by song identifier.

If you want to run the /similarity/by_song operation, you can do so via an HTTP GET command to the following URL:

```
https://searchly.asuarez.dev/api/v1/similarity/by_song
```
data.summary_suggestion: Find similar songs by song identifier
data.description_suggestion: Searches the database for songs with similar lyrics to a specified song using k-nearest neighbors algorithm. Accepts a song identifier as a query parameter and returns a ranked list of similar songs based on lyrical content similarity. Uses word2vec embeddings to compute semantic similarity between song lyrics.
data.reasoning: Original summary is generic and doesn't convey the action clearly. Description lacks critical details about what the operation returns, how similarity is computed, and what the input parameter represents. Added specifics about the KNN algorithm, word2vec embeddings, and return format to improve AI agent interpretability and domain context consistency.

data.current_summary: API endpoint to search similarity using content
data.current_description:
Endpoint for an end-user client to search similarity by content.

If you want to run the /similarity/by_content operation, you can do so via an HTTP POST command to the following URL:

```
https://searchly.asuarez.dev/api/v1/similarity/by_content
```
data.summary_suggestion: Find similar songs by lyrical content
data.description_suggestion: Searches the database for songs with similar lyrics to provided text content using k-nearest neighbors algorithm. Accepts free-form lyrical text in the JSON request body and returns a ranked list of similar songs based on semantic similarity. Uses word2vec embeddings to compute similarity between the input lyrics and songs in the 100k song database.
data.reasoning: Original summary is too vague and doesn't indicate the action or domain context. data.current_summary: API endpoint to search songs from the database given a query
data.current_description:
Endpoint for an end-user client to search songs from the database given a String query.

If you want to run the /song/search operation, you can do so via an HTTP GET command to the following URL:

```
https://searchly.asuarez.dev/api/v1/song/search
```
data.summary_suggestion: Search songs by title or artist query
data.description_suggestion: Searches the 100k song database for songs matching a query string. Accepts a search query parameter and returns matching songs with metadata including title, artist, and lyrics. Supports partial matching on song titles and artist names. Useful for identifying specific songs before performing similarity searches.
data.reasoning: Original summary is generic and doesn't clarify what type of search is performed. Description lacks specificity about search scope (title vs. artist), return format, and use case context. Added clarity about database size, searchable fields, return metadata, and the relationship to similarity operations to help AI agents understand this operation's role in the workflow.

data.current_summary: API endpoint to search songs from the database given a query
data.current_description:
Endpoint for an end-user client to search songs from the database given a String query.

If you want to run the /song/search operation, you can do so via an HTTP GET command to the following URL:

```
https://searchly.asuarez.dev/api/v1/song/search
```
data.summary_suggestion: Search for songs by title or artist query
data.description_suggestion: Searches the 100k song database for songs matching a query string. Accepts a search query parameter (e.g., song title, artist name, or keywords) and returns matching songs with metadata. Results are retrieved from the AZLyrics database and include song information relevant to the search criteria.
data.reasoning: Original summary is generic and doesn't clarify what type of query is expected.
